thread.title: Dale

author: Dale
title: Dale
text: We began staying with Outrageous Cabins several years ago and we have never been dissatisfied. Convenient location. Great cabins. Awesome views. They have it all. We visit the area at least once a year and sometimes 2 - 3 times a year and we always stay at one of the Outrageous cabins. They are really great people to work with. If you are missing anything just call them. On our last visit we needed a pot to cook chili in and within an hour we had a whole new cookware set delivered. Wonderful people. I would recommend them to anyone from newlyweds to retirees. They have a cabin for everyone. Looking forward to the next trip.
